name: Lost Signal (JokubasG)
description:
Lost Signal is a online multiplayer game where you play a team of astronauts whose spaceship lost connection with the earth.  You need to fix the ship by completing tasks, defend against alien attacks and fix the spaceship's antenna to reconnect to earth.

The game was made for the Multiplayer Game Jam by Global Game Jam and Photon.

How to play:

- Go towards tasks indicated by the warning signs on the minimap and fix them.

- Grab part boxes and take them to the left side of the spaceship to fix the antenna.

Controls:  

 WASD: Move

 Space: Interact

 Left-click: Shoot

Credits:

Game and art by JokubasG

Music and audio design by Icy Wong
